i am here to assist you in writing your response for the given prompt.

  1. your online privacy is important.

  2. you can protect your personal information on social media by:

    • not sharing too much personal information with strangers

    • using a strong password and changing it periodically

    • avoiding public wi-fi networks to prevent data theft

    • being cautious of suspicious links or emails

    • deleting unnecessary apps and updating your software regularly

    remember that social media platforms are not always trustworthy. therefore, it is essential to protect yourself from potential threats.
